root.name: Redline: F1 Racer
root.description: OverviewRedline: F1 Racer is a Formula 1 racing game from Genki. The game was released in Japan on July 14, 1992, more than a year before the North American release. It is known in Japan as Suzuki Aguri no F-1 Super Driving, named for its celebrity tie-in Formula 1 racer Aguri Suzuki. The European version has the similar title of Aguri Suzuki F-1 Super Driving.Aguri Suzuki F-1 Super Driving was also released for the Game Boy in 1993.
